goals.1: packing all objects into the bin
goals.2: If there is a black object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a white and soft object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: don't pick and place a box called bin
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.4: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object and replace it into the bin
